General.Name: Surya Toto Indonesia Tbk
General.Description: PT Surya Toto Indonesia Tbk engages in the manufacture and sale of sanitary wares, fittings, kitchen systems, and other related products in Indonesia. The company operates through Sanitary, Fittings, Kitchen systems, and Electrical Appliances and Accessories segments. It offers sanitary wares, including neorests, toilets, lavatories, urinals, bidets, bathtubs, and sinks; automatic, shower and bath, and shower spray fittings, as well as faucets; washlets; and accessories, such as robe hooks, floor drains, door handles, shelfs, tumbler holders, bathroom products, paper holders, soap holders, and towel holders, as well as supplementary and other products. The company also exports its products. PT Surya Toto Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in West Jakarta, Indonesia.
